She hopes this will help her cow stay healthy as she is waiting for a calf to be born from her cow.

loans.use: To buy food for the cow

loans.name: Ššaha

texts.en: Šaha Kotorić‡ is 50 years old and she is from Tesanj. She is married with two children, and her husband is retired. Šaha works in a manufacturing company, and she earn 250 KM per month.  She also has a cattle business and she is requesting a loan to buy another cow for her cattle business. This is her third loan from WWI in the amount of 1,200 KM.

loans.use: To buy a cow

loans.name: Suvada

texts.en: Suvada Kotorić‡ was born in 1959 in the town of Tesanj. She is married with one child. Her husband is employed in  manufacturing company and earns 400 KM monthly. This is her third loan from WWI in the amount of 1,200 KM. Suvada will use this loan to buy chickens to resell. Her wish is for her poultry business to be successful so that her family can have a better standard of life.

loans.use: To buy chickens to resell

loans.name: Matluba

texts.ru: Холбоева Матлюба жительница Бохтарского района. 15 лет занимается торговлей . Торгует на центральном рынке  материалами. Живет со своей семьей в центре района. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей. Планирует получить кредит сроком на шесть месяцев. Использовать деньги хочет в целях бизнеса, то есть увеличить товарооборот. Это поможет увеличить ассортимент товара и привлечь новых клиентов.
texts.en:
Matluba H. lives with her family in the center of Bohtarskiy region. She had been in the business of textile sales for the last 15 years. She has a space in a central market that she uses to sell different textiles. She is married and has 2 children. Matluba plans to obtain a loan for 6 months and use the money to increase her inventory. This will help her to attract new customers and improve her business.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase inventory

loans.name: Rummi

texts.ru: Давлятова Румми проживает в городе Курган-Тюбе. Возраст 47 лет, замужем и имеет одного ребенка. Работает в ресторане «Оби тоза» . Занимается этим делом уже 20 лет. Планирует расширять бизнес , для этого он хочет получить кредит в размере 1000 долларов США , сроком на 12 месяцев.
texts.en:
Rummi Davlatova lives in the town of Kurgan-Tube. She is 47 years old, married, and has one child. She owns a grocery store "Obi toza." She has been in this business for 20 years. She plans to expand her business, and for that reason, she would like to obtain a loan for $1,000 for 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To expand business

loans.name: Abdumanon

texts.ru: Насиров Абдуманон  житель района Бохтар. Возраст 33 года, женат, имеет 4 детей. Образование среднее.Клиент занимается  занимается куплей продажей  велосипедов. Имеет опыт в этом бизнесе 11 лет. Этот вид деятельности является основным источником дохода его семьи.В данный момент клиент хочет увеличить товарооборот.Планирует погасить кредит в течении 12 месяцев.
texts.en:
Abdumanon N. is a resident of Bohtar region. He is 33 years old, married, and has 4 children. He has secondary education. Abdumanon is in the business of buying and selling bicycles. He has been in this business for 11 years. This activity is the single main source of income for his family. At this point in time, Abdumanon would like obtain a loan to increase his inventory.

He plans to pay off the loan in 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase inventory

loans.name: Abdusamad

texts.ru: Дододжонов Абдусамад житель района Курган-Тюбе .Возраст 41 год, женат, имеет 4 детей.Образование среднее. Клиент имеет на месном рынке небольшую торговую точку,на которой торгует зеленью и овощами. В данный момент клиент хочет расширить свой бизнес.Абдусамад хочет реализовать крышки и банки для консервирования.Теперь клиенты будут покупать не только  овощи и зелень,а так же все необходимое для консервирования. Планирует погасить кредит в течении 12 месяцев
texts.en:
Abdusamad D. is a resident of Kurgan-Tube. He is 41 years old, married, and has 4 children. He has secondary education. He owns a space in a food market that he uses to sell veggies. At this point in time, he would like to expand his business by purchasing additional supplies for preservation of fruits and vegetables. Then, his customers will be able to purchase not only vegetables, but also other supplies. He plans to pay off the loan in 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase jars and lids for food preservation

loans.name: Mrs. Men Leat Village Bank Group

texts.en:
The Village Bank which consists of twenty-one people is located in Kandal Kraom Village in Kandal Province. Mrs. Men L. is the Village Bank President. Her husband, Mr. S. Sareth, is employed in a small position in Cambodia Public Bank where he makes $150 per month. But, with this income he cannot support his family well because the inflation in Cambodia is too high and he cannot save enough money. 
Mrs. Men L. is 35 years old and the mother of two children who are too young to work or study.  Since Mrs. Men L.'s house does not have a gate and some of her vegetables are damaged by cattle. She needs a loan to buy wood to make a fence in order to protect her garden. Two men among seven come to take a loan instead of their wives. Mrs. Em Sok K. and Mrs. Son K. are shown in the picture.

loans.use: To ask for a loan to buy wood to make a fence in order to protect animals.

loans.name: Imomkul

texts.ru: Буриев Имомкул житель района Дж.Руми .Возраст 42 года,женат , имеет 3 детей.Образование среднее.Клиент имеет небольшую торговую точку на местном рынке,где торгует видео и аудио кассетами.Бизнес является единственным  источниокм дохода  его семьи.В данный момент  Имомкул хочет учеличить ассортимент торговой точки. Для  чего и  берет  кредит сроком на 12 месяцев.
texts.en:
Imomkul B. lives in the J. Rumy region. He is 42 years old, is married and has 3 chidren. Imomkul has a high school education. He owns a small sales location at the local market where he sells video and audio tapes. This business is the sole source of income for his family. At this moment, Imomkul would like to increase the product selection at his sales location. He has decided to take out a 12 month loan.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase product selection

loans.name: Gavhar

texts.ru: Джармуратова Гавхар жительница района Дж.Руми.Возраст 27 лет, замужем, имеет 5 детей.Образование среднее. Клиентка на местном рынке района имеет торговую точку ,на которой торгует  детской одеждой. Она покупает у оптовых поставщиков  товар и реализует его в розницу. Этот вид бизнеса является основным источником дохода ее семьи.В данный мрмент клиентка хочет закупить сезонную одежду.Поэтому решила взять кредит сроком на 12 месяцев.
texts.en:
Gavhar J. lives in the J. Rumy region. She is 27 years old, is married and has 5 children. Gavhar has a high school education. She has a sales location at the local market, where she sells children’s clothing. She purchases products from wholesalers and resells them at retail prices. This business is the main source of income for her family. Gavhar would like to purchase seasonal clothing for sale. She has decided to take out a 12 month loan in order to do this.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase seasonal clothing

loans.name: Hosiyat

texts.ru: Носирлоева Хосият  жительница района Дж.Руми. Возраст 42 года,вдова,имеет 4 детей. Образование среднее. Клиентка имеет на местном рынке торговую точку,где торгует  зап.частями для велосипедов.Этот вид бизнеса является основным источником дохода ее большой семьи. В данный момент она хочет закупить товар у оптовых поставщиков.Планирует погасить кредит в тчении 12 месяцев.
texts.en:
Hosiyat N. lives in the J. Rumy region. She is 42 years old, is a widow and has 4 children. Hosiyat has a high school education. She has a sales location at the local market where she sells bicycle parts. This business is the main source of income for her large family. Right now, she would like to purchase products from wholesalers. Hosiyat plans to pay back her loan over 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase additional products for sale

loans.name: Mrs. Meas Sophea Village Bank Group

texts.en: Twenty-two people in Kandal Kraom Village in Kandal Province have formed a village bank loan and plan to use the loan for different purposes. Mrs. Meas S. is the village bank president who has been selected by the members. She is a housewife and her husband, Mr. Leng Yi, is an ice-cream seller in the local village. In his business, he now faces a small problem because his ice-cream box is too old which can affect his products so he wants to buy a new one. Therefore, his wife, Mrs. Meas S. decided to ask for a loan to buy it for her husband. Mrs. Meas S. is 42 years old and the mother of five children two of whom are employed in a garment factoR. while other two are attending. The youngest one is too young to work or study at three years old.

loans.use: To ask for a loan to buy ice-cream box to replace the old one.

loans.name: Sohib

texts.ru: Каракулов Сохиб житель района Хуросон.Возраст 63 года.,женат , имеет 6 детей. Образование среднее. Клиент занимается посевом бахчевых культур.Каждый год на своем земельном участке он выращивает  арбузы и дыни. В этом году клиент получил хороший урожай.Поэтому он хочет взять в аренду грузовую машину и привезти свой урожай в город.Планирует  получить кредит и погасить кредит в течении 12 месяцев.Если он вовремя сможет реализовать урожай , то он сможет  успеть засеить пшеницу.
texts.en:
Sohib K. lives in the Khuroson district. He is 63 years old, married and has 6 children. He has a secondary education and grows melons for a living. Every year he grows watermelons and cantaloupes on his plot of land. This year’s harvest was especially good. This is why Sohib wants to rent a truck and bring his harvest to the city. He plans to obtain a loan and repay it within 12 months. If he sells his harvest in a timely manner, then he will be able to sow wheat.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To rent a truck

loans.name: Mrs. Nuon Ret Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Nuon R. is the group leader of four who live in Phum Thmei Village in Kampong Chhnang Province and they plan to use the loan for different purposes. For instance, Mrs. Nuon R. is a farmer and she will use the loan to purchase fertilizers to support her plantation because her rice field now has infertile soil. Besides this business, she also sews palm leaves together to process into thatches to sell. Mrs. Nuon R. is a 56-year-old widow with two children, one of whom is a motorbike taxi driver who can generate $3 per day. The other one, 16, is attending the local school. 

Four members have end-of-term loans and these members are not required to pay any principal on the loan until the very end of the loan term. End-of-term (EoT) loans are AMK's main product because it is the most beneficial to Cambodia's poor. It allows them to repay portions of the principal whenever they are financially able to. Most clients start to make payments many months before the end of the loan term. Almost all of AMK's clients make their payments on time. AMK has a delinquency rate of only 0.09% and AMK has a default rate of 0% on Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers to support her plantation.

loans.name: Diouf

texts.fr: A. diouf est née le 10 mars 1956 à Kandiar dans le département de Bambey.Elle est mariée et vit dans la commune de Bambey.Elle s'active dans le commerce de légumes depuis trois ans.Avec ce pret elle renforce son capital pour une meilleur rentabilité.
texts.en:
Diouf A. was born on March 10, 1956 in Kandiar in the Bambey department. She is married and lives in the Bambey village. She has been in the business of selling vegetables for three years. With this loan, she will reinforce her capital for better profitability.

Translated from French by Lucia Franzese, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Vegetable sales

loans.name: Tuhtashkul

texts.ru: Мусоев Тухташкул житель района Хуросон.Возраст 51 год, женат, имеет 4 детей. Образование средне-техническое.По специальности бухгалтер.Работает в средней школе.Так как заработная плата очень  маленькая клиент  занимается сельским хозяйством.Он сеет на своем земельном участке кукурузу. Собрав урожай он делает запасы корма  для своих сельхоз.животных и кур.Лишнее реализует на местном рынке.В данный момент клиент хочет купить семена кукурузы и пшеницы для осеннего посева.Планирует погасить кредит в течении 12 месяцев.
texts.en:
Tuhtashkul M. lives in the Khuroson district. He is 51 years old, married and has 4 children. He has a vocational education and is an accountant by trade. He works at a secondary school. Since his salary is very low, Tuhtashkul has been involved in agriculture. He plants corn on his plot of land. He utilizes part of the harvest as food for his domestic animals and chickens, and sells any excess at a local market. Currently, Tuhtashkul wants to purchase corn and wheat seeds needed for fall sowing. He plans to repay the loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy corn and wheat seeds

loans.name: Roziya

texts.ru: Абдуназарова Розия жительница района Хуросон. Возраст 32 года, замужем, имеет 4 детей. Клиентка занимается выращиванием овощей. Помогает ей ее муж.После сбора урожая Розия реализует его на месном рынке по выгодной ей цене.Этот вид деятельности помогает ей  содержать свою семью.В данный момент клиентка хочет купить семена и саженцы овощей.Планирует погасить кредит в течении 12 месяцев.
texts.en:
Roziya A. lives in the Khuroson district. She is 32 years old, married and has 4 children. She grows vegetables with the help of her husband. She sells her harvest at a local market for profit. This business helps her support her family. Currently, Roziya wants to purchase seeds and vegetable seedlings. She plans to repay the loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase vegetable seedlings

loans.name: Mr. Khut Khum Village Bank Group

texts.en:
Twelve people in Chrey Kaong Lich Village in Kampong ChhnA. Province make up the village bank loan and they plan to use it for multiple purposes. Mr. Khut K. is the village bank president and he is a palm juice collector who gathers palm juice to process into palm wine or sugar. Aside from this business activity, he is a fisherman in the local lake. His wife, Mrs. Suong Mom raises three cows and two pigs. Since her cows and pigs grow bigger every day, Mrs. Suong  does not have enough money to buy grass for the cows and pig food for the pigs. Thus, Mr. Khut K. decided to ask for a loan for his wife. Mr. Khut K. is 26 years old and the father of a four year old child who is too young to work or attend school.  Mr. Phon S. and Mr. Chea P. could not come to take the loan but their wives came to take the loan instead so they are in the picture. 

Twelve members have end-of-term loans and these members are not required to pay any principal on the loan until the very end of the loan term. End-of-term (EoT) loans are AMK's main policy because they are the most beneficial to Cambodia's poor. It allows them to repay portions of the principal whenever they are financially able to. Most clients start to make payments many months before the end of the loan term. Almost all of AMK's clients make their payments on time. AMK has a delinquency rate of only 0.09% and AMK has a default rate of 0% on Kiva.

loans.use: To buy grass for the cows and pig food for the pigs.

loans.name: Dioum

texts.fr: M. Dioum est née le 03 mars 1955 à bambey.Elle vit au quartier DVF avec sa famille et s'active dans le commerce de chaussures depuis six ans.Ce pret lui permet de mieux préparer la fétes de Korité et la Rentrée des Classes.
texts.en:
Dioum M. was born on March 3, 1955 in Bambey. She lives in the DVF district with her family. She has been in the business of selling shoes for six years. This loan will allow her to be better prepared for the Ramadan Holiday and the start of the school year.

Translated from French by Lucia Franzese, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Shoe sales

loans.name: Thi Huong's Group

texts.vi:
chị C. thị Hương Ms 01030017 năm nay 32 tuổi, chị là một phụ nữ rất năng động và hoà đồng với mọi người, công việc bán hoa tươi nên lúc nào cũng bận rộn, cùng với việc chăm sóc 2 con đi học, chồng chị làm công an xã nên không giúp chị được nhiều trong công việc gía đình. Nhưng mỗi khi người dân đến mua hàng, đều nhìn thấy vẻ mặy luôn tươi cười chào đón, vì vậy cửa hàng nhà chị lúc nào cũng đông khách đến mua nhất là vào dịp lễ tết. Thu nhập của gia đình chị ngày càng ổn định hơn trước từ 150.000 VND đến 170.000 VND/ ngày. Chị cùng nhóm đã tham gia vay vốn qua 2 C. kỳ và hoàn trả rất tốt, lần này chị đăng ký vay tiếp C. kỳ III với mức vay 5.152.000 VND để mua hoa, giấy trang trí đám cưới, mở rộng hàng kính mắt nhằm thu hút nhiều khách hơn. Các thành viên trong nhóm chị :

  • chị Nguyễn thị Minh Ms 01030018 vay mức 5.152.000 VND để kinh doanh điện thoại
  • chị Lê thị Hà Ms 01030019 vay mức 5.152.000 VND để kinh doanh chăn ga gối đệm
  • chị Đặng thị Hoa Ms 01030020 vay mức 5.152.000 VND để kinh doanh điện thoại di động
  • chị Tống hồng Xuyên Ms 01030021 vay mức 5.152.000 VND để kinh doanh áo cưới
  • chị Nghiêm thị Thành Ms 01030022 vay mức 5.152.000 VND để đầu tư vào cửa hàng giầy dép.
texts.en:
Mrs. C. Thi Huong (ID: 01030017), aged 32, is a very active and sociable woman. Mrs. Huong is very busy, as she sells flowers in the farmer market as well as takes care of her two children. Her husband is a local police, so he is very busy too and isn’t able to help her much with all the family work. Mrs. Huong’s flower shop is relatively popular in the area, especially during the Lunar New Year and festivals. The daily income of the family is about 150.000-170.000 VND. Mrs. Huong and her group’s members have been very on time in paying back the loans of the previous round. In the next round of loan, Mrs. Huong would like to borrow 5.152.000 VND to buy more flowers, decoration papers for wedding to expand her business. Other members in her group include: -Mrs. N. Thi Minh (ID: 01030018) would like to borrow 5.152.000 VND to open a small shop selling telephones. -Mrs. Le Thi Ha (ID: 01030019) would like to borrow 5.152.000 VND to open a small shop selling blankets and pillows. -Mrs. Dang Thi Hoa (ID: 01030020) would like to borrow 5.152.000 VND to open a small shop selling cell phones. -Mrs. T. Hong Xuyen (ID: 01030021) would like to borrow 5.152.000 VND to open a shop selling wedding dresses. -Mrs. N. Thi Hanh (ID: 01030022) would like to borrow 5.152.000 VND to open a shop selling footwear.

Translated from Vietnamese by Khoa N., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Vay vốn buôn bán

loans.name: Mrs. Ngen Saroeurn Village Bank Group

texts.en:
Fifteen members in Phlov Veay Village in Kampong Chhnang Province makeup the village bank loan. Mrs. Nhen S., 59, is the village bank president. She is a rice and palm sugar middleman who buys rice and palm sugar to keep in stock and sell later at a better price. Since this business is going well, she wants to expand it. She decided to ask for a loan to buy more rice and sugar to keep in stock. Her husband, Mr. Vong Soeurn, is a village chief who can make a small income to support his famiL.. 
Three members have end-of-term loans and the rest have monthL. payment loans. These members are not required to pay any principal on the loan until the veR. end of the loan term. End-of-term (EoT) loans are AMK's main policy because they are the most beneficial to Cambodia's poor. It allows them to repay portions of the principal whenever they  are financialL. able to. Most clients start to make payments many months before the end of the loan term. Almost all of AMK's clients make their payments on time. AMK has a delinquency rate of onL. 0.09% and AMK has a default rate of 0% on Kiva.

loans.use: To buy more rice and sugar to keep in stock than re-sell later at a better price.

loans.name: Mr. Neum Vannak Group

texts.en: Mr. Neum V. is the group leader of four entrepenuers who are all live in Trapaing Orn Village in Kampong Chhnang Province. Mr. Neum V. is a cow breeder who raises four cows to sell at market. His wife, Mrs. Chea Phearun, owns a small store where she sells pots in the local village. Her business is thriving, and she wants to expand, so part of the loan will be used to buy more pots for her business. This is a group loan consisting of mainly end-of-term loans which means they will repay the loan in a single payment at the end of the loan term. However, most clients start to make payments many months before the end of the loan term. AMK has a delinquency rate of only 0.09% and AMK has a default rate of 0% on Kiva.

loans.use: To buy more pots for re-selling.

loans.name: Abena

texts.en:
Abena S. is 38 years old. She is married and has two children. Two of her kids are still in school. She owns and operates a grocery shop and sells items like sugar, vegetable oil, bottled water, pastries which she prepares herself, skimmed powdered milk and biscuits etc. to people from her neighborhood.

With the loan, Abena wants to purchase more crates of assorted drinks, bags of sugar, cartons of vegetable oil, boxes of biscuits, etc., to increase her inventory. She hopes to improve her savings to support her children in school. Abena S. belongs to the Trust group called Lydia Mma Trust Group. In this group, members guarantee for one another as social collateral to the loan and support one another to repay the loan. (Her picture was taken when she was visited at her shop.)

loans.use: To buy more cartons of assorted drinks, bags of sugar, cartons of bottled mineral water, and boxes of biscuits, etc.

loans.name: Saliou

texts.fr: Saliou N. est né le 14 janvier 1988 à Bambey.Il est célibataire et vit avec ses parents.son activité consiste à vendre des produits alimentaires en  boutique.Son souhait c'est de pouvoir renforcer une boutique d'alimentation général dans les prochains jours avec ce financement.
texts.en:
Saliou N. was born on January 14, 1988 in Bambey. He is single and lives with his parents. He is in the business of selling general food products in a store. His wish is that he will be able to strengthen his general food store within the coming days with this loan.

Translated from French by Lucia Franzese, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Sale of general food items

loans.name: Mrs. Lach Yen Village Bank Group

texts.en:
Twelve people in Chrolong Village in Kampong Chhnang Province make up the village bank. Mrs. Lach Y. is the group leader and she is a farmer who cultivates twice a year. She is a 45-year-old widow with five children who are all attending the local school. Mrs. Lach Y.'s family now lives in poor conditions. In order to improve her standard of living, Mrs. Lach Y. decided to ask for a loan to buy a cow for breeding. She hopes to increase her income with this new loan. 
All of the members have end-of-term loans so they are not required to pay any principal on the loan until the very end of the loan term. End-of-term (EoT) loans are AMK's main policy because they are most beneficial to Cambodia's poor. It allows them to repay portions of the principal whenever they are financially able to. Most clients start to make payments many months before the end of the loan term. Almost all of AMK's clients make their payments on time. AMK has a delinquency rate of only 0.09% and AMK has a default rate of 0% on Kiva.

loans.use: To buy a cow for breeding.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary D. is a widow and mother of six grown-up children, with four of them fully independent and the other two currently in school. She is fifty-three years old and an energetic businesswoman who sells charcoal, cooking oil, bags of rice, etc.

Charcoal is a very popular source of energy for cooking in many traditional Ghanaian homes. With her 22 years of experience in her business, she has supported four of her children to complete senior high school.

Mary obtains her supply of charcoal from the surrounding villages of Obuasi and retails it to her customers. She wants to use the loan to buy more charcoal, cooking oil, and bags of rice, etc. to increase her stock. She believes the loan will enable her to increase her savings to provide for the educational needs of her children. She belongs to the trust group called "Odo ne Asomdwei" meaning Love and Peace Trust Group. In this group, members guarantee for one another as social collateral and provide support to one another to repay the loan

loans.use: To buy more charcoal, cooking oil, and bags of rice, etc.

loans.name: Allanazar

texts.ru: Алаеров Алланазар житель района Хуросон.Возраст 53 года, женат , имеет 7 детей. Образование среднее. Клиент более 15 лет занимается куплей продажей крупно-рогатого скота. Он покупает молодых бычков на местном рынке , откармливает их в течении 45 дней и продает по более выгодной ему цене. Этот вид бизнеса помогает ему содержать его  большую семью.В данный моменнт Алланазар хочет купить 2 бычков.Поэтому он решил взять кредит сроком на 12 месяцев.
texts.en:
Allanazar A. lives in the Khuroson region. He is 53 years old, is married and has 7 children. Allanazar has a high school education. For over 15 years he has been purchasing and reselling livestock. He purchases young calves at the local market, fattens them over 45 days and sells them for a profit. This business helps Allanazar to support his large family. Allanazar would like to purchase two calves and has decided to take out a 12 month loan.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase two calves

loans.name: Tanjigul

texts.ru: Хурамова Таджигул жительница района Хуросон.Возраст 60 лет, замужем, имеет  2 детей. Клиентка на  протяжении 20 лет занимается животноводством.В данное время в доме клиентки нет дойной коровы. Она решила взть кредит сроком на 12 месяцев и купить корову.Что бы в семье всегда было свежее молоко и кисло-молочная продукция.
texts.en:
Tanjigul H. lives in the Khuroson region. She is 60 years old, is married and has 2 children. Tanjigul has been raising livestock for 20 years. Right now she does not own a dairy cow. She has decided to take out a 12 month loan to purchase a cow in order to provide her family with fresh milk and dairy products.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Mamuna

texts.en:
Mamuna S. is married with five children who have completed school. She is a 44-year-old businesswoman. She started in commerce six years ago, and she enjoys selling goods. She sells clothing materials and used clothes.

Mamuna believes in hard work and dedication. She has gained lots of marketing experience, making her one of the more successful traders in Obuasi market. She believes the loan would provide her more with capital to purchase more stocks of clothing materials to serve her customers. Mamuna S. belongs to the group called Gift Trust Group. Members in this group guarantee and provide support for one another to repay the loan.

loans.use: To purchase more stocks of clothing materials and used clothes.

loans.name: Mrs. Hur Tonn Village Bank Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hur T. is the president of the village bank.  This village bank consists of nine people who are all live in Chrolong Village in Kampong Chhnang Province. Mrs. Hur T. is a farmer and her husband, Mr. Toem Sareth, is a fisherman in the local lake. Aside from this business, he breeds pigs and cows. In Mr. Toem Sareth's fishing business, he does not have enough money to buy fishing equipment so his wife, Mrs. Hur T., decided to ask for a loan for her husband to buy the equipment. Mrs. Hur T. is a 54-year-old mother without any children. 
This is a village bank loan consisting of mainly end-of-term loans. Six members have end-of-term loans and the rest have monthly payment loans. These members are not required to pay any principal on the loan until the very end of the loan term. End-of-term (EoT) loans are AMK's main product because it is the most beneficial to Cambodia's poor. It allows them to repay portions of the principal whenever they are financially able to. Most clients start to make payments many months before the end of the loan term. Almost all of AMK's clients make their payments on time. AMK has a delinquency rate of only 0.09% and AMK has a default rate of 0% on Kiva.

loans.use: To ask for a loan to buy more fishing equipments to catch fish.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary T. is 36 years old and a mother with three children. The children are currently in school. Selling of used clothing has a very big market in Ghana as brand new clothos, shoes and other materials are very expensive for the economically active poor. Therefore, selling of used clothing and shoes has created a market for many women like Mary.

With the loan, she wants to buy more bales of used clothing and shoes to increase her inventory. She believes this loan could help her save for her children's future and also to rent a store to sell out of. She is a member of the trust group called Winners. Members in this group agree to guarantee and support one another to repay the loan.

loans.use: to buy bales of used clothing, used shoes, etc.

loans.name: Urozali

texts.ru: Бобокулов Урозали  житель района Вахш. Возраст 54 года, женат , имеет 5 детей.Образование среднее.Клиент занимается посевом пшеницы на своем участке. Каждый год он собирает неплохой урожай.Который потом реализует на местном рынке.В данный момент клиент хочет получить кредит для покупки семян пшеницы , а так же подготовить землю к посеву. Кредит будет использовать для приобретения удобрений, платить за аренду трактора и покупку топлива. Планирует погасить кредит в течении 10 месяцев.   У него большая семья и кроме выращивания пшеницы они занимаются садоводством. Выращивают яблони . Это является дополнительным заработком семьи.
texts.en:
Urozali B. lives in the Vakhsh region. He is 54 years old, is married and has 5 children. Urozali has a high school education. He plants wheat on his plot of land. Every year he has a decent harvest, which he then sells at the local market. Right now, Urozali would like to take out a loan to purchase wheat seeds and to get the land ready for planting. He will use the loan to purchase fertilizer, to pay for a tractor rental and to pay for fuel. He plans to pay back the loan over 10 months. Urozali has a big family and in addition to growing wheat they also have an orchard and grow apples. This provides them with an additional source of income.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase wheat seeds and prepare land for planting

loans.name: Mrs. Ban Sok's Village Bank Group

texts.en:
Fourteen people in Chrolong Village in Kampong Chhnang Province form a village bank [solidarity group]. The group members will use the loan in different ways. Mrs. Ban S. is the village bank president, and she raises three pigs and four cows. Because her animals are growing very fast now and she does not have enough money to purchase more food to feed them, Mrs. Ban S. decided to ask for a loan. Her husband, Mr. Kong Teng, helps his wife with the business. Mrs. Ban S. is a 34-year-old woman without any children.

Mrs. Yin G. L. did not come to receive her loan. Her husband came for her instead, so he is presented in the picture.

This is a village bank loan consisting of mainly end-of-term loans. Ten members have end-of-term loans, and the rest have monthly payment loans. These members are not required to pay any principal on the loan until the very end of the loan term. End-of-term (EoT) loans are AMK's main product because they are the most beneficial to Cambodia's poor. The product allows them to repay portions of the principal whenever they are financially able to do so. Most clients start to make payments many months before the end of the loan term. Almost all of AMK's clients make their payments on time. AMK [Kiva’s Field Partner] has a delinquency rate of only 0.09% and AMK has a default rate of 0% on Kiva.

loans.use: To buy pig food to feed her pigs

loans.name: Jumagul

texts.ru: Саламова Джумагуль жительница района Вахш. Возраст 28 лет, замужем , имеет 4 детей. Клиентка занимаеся выращиванием овощей. Она имеет небольшой участок земли на котором каждый год сеет овощи и зелень.Готовый урожай реализует на местном рынке. Этот вид деятельности помогает ей содержать  свою семью.В данный момент клиентка хочет закупить саженцы овощей.Планирует погасить кредит в течении 10 месяцев.
texts.en:
Jumagul S. lives in the Vakhsh region. She is 28 years old, is married and has 4 children. Jumagul grows vegetables. She has a small plot of land where she plants vegetables and greens every year. Jumagul sells her harvest at the local market. This business helps her to support her family. At the moment, Jumagul want to purchase vegetable seedlings. She will pay back the loan over 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase vegetable seedlings

loans.name: Erika

texts.en:
Erika is an entrepreneur from the small town of Korolyovo. She owns a nice little store selling souvenirs and gifts. Erika makes a good profit and always has many clients as there is little competition in the area. Erika has been in this sphere of trade for about 5 years. Presently, she is getting about US$ 1000 in income. Over US$ 10,000 is invested in inventory.

One of the most positive characteristics of her venture is stability. Financial assistance from Nadiya Ukraine has added much to growing the sustainability of her enterprise. Today Erika is hoping to get a 3000 Grivna loan to increase the assortment of merchandise and earn extra profit as a result. The loan will be a big help to Erika as she is a widow and has to rely on herself alone in terms of providing a decent living.

loans.use: To increase assortment of inventory

loans.name: Kenjagul

texts.ru: Эшонкулова Кенджагуль  жительница района Вахш.Возраст 25 лет , замужем, имеет 3 детей. Кенджагуль занимается выращиванием пшеницы.Имеет опыт в этой деятельности более 2 лет.собрав урожай клиентка  в течении  года не покупает муку с рынка. В данный момент онахочет получить кредит для покупки семян пшеницы.Планирует погасить кредит в течении 10 месяцев.
texts.en:
Kenjagul E. lives in the Vakhsh region. She is 25 years old, is married and has 3 children. Kenjagul grows wheat. She has more than 2 years of experience in this area. After harvesting the wheat, Kenjagul does not need to purchase flour from the market for an entire year. At the moment she would like to purchase seeds for wheat planting. Kenjagul plans to pay back the loan over 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase wheat seeds

loans.name: Radhika

texts.en: Radhika S. is 52 years old and lives in Kritipur, Kathmandu. Kritipur is a developing city of  Kathmandu. She lives with her husband, Ram Krishna S., and their two daughters. Their eldest daughter is studying BBS second year and another daughter is studying in 10+2 class. Radhika's husband works in a private office, but the family's income is not enough to meet their basic needs. Radhika opened her grocery business 8 years ago and seeks a loan of Rs. 30,000 ($425 USD) to buy more rice, biscuits, noodles and other items to meet the demand of her customers. She wants to earn money for her daughters' education and also to raise the standard of living for her family.

loans.use: To purchase grocery items for her shop

loans.name: Galina

texts.en:
Galina runs a small enterprise in a local market of Shidnitsya, Western Ukraine. She sells sportswear and underwear. Galina has been actively involved in this business for the past two and a half years. Currently, she has over $5000 in gross income.

Galina has an enterprising spirit. She is a thorough planner, very punctual and active. One of her long-term plans is to open another vending stand in the market. Galina believes a current increase of assorted merchandise will help her develop her trade consistently and move her one step further in her business progress. Galina is now requesting a 3000 Grivna loan.

Note: This is a short term "seasonal" loan that will be repaid in two months.

loans.use: To re-stock inventory

loans.name: Narayan Devi

texts.en:
Narayan Devi M., 40 years old, lives in Kritipur, Kathmandu. She lives in a nuclear family with her 45-year-old husband Sri Krishna M. and two sons who are studying in grades 11 and 12 respectively. Her husband works in a private office.

Her economic condition was so weak that she could hardly fulfill the basic needs of her family. So she opened her tailoring shop five years ago. Other tailoring shops are not available near her shop. The number of her customers is increasing by day, so she seeks a loan of Rs. 25000/- to buy another machine and employ a tailor to meet the demand of her customers. She will be happy if she earns more to spend for her children's education and for the betterment of her family.

loans.use: To buy another sewing machine

loans.name: Jasminka

texts.en:
Jasminka‡ is 54 years old and she is from Lukavac. She is married and her husband is employed. Her husband helps her with paying for household expenses and school for their daughter. He earns 680 KM a month. Jasminka sells milk and milk products and in this way she earn about 150 KM monthly.

This is her first loan with Women for Women International in the amount of 600 KM. She will use this loan to buy a calf for reselling. She has her own food for cattle, which she produces in her field. Her wish is to buy more cattle for reselling.

loans.use: To buy a calf

loans.name: Kanchi

texts.en:
Kanchi L., 40 years old, lives in Kritipur, Kathmandu. She lives in a single family with her husband, Hira Lal L., and two sons. They are studying in grade 9 and BBS 1 year respectively. Her husband has no work and is also not educated.

She opened her vegetable shop 3 years ago. Both of them work in her small vegetable shop. Her condition is miserable and she is unable to run her house smoothly. She seeks a loan of RS.20000/- to invest in her vegetable shop. She wants to earn money to provide a quality education for their sons and fulfill their basic needs.

loans.use: To invest in her vegetable shop

loans.name: Nigina

texts.ru: Махмудова Нигина жительница района Вахш.Возраст 38 лет, замужем , имеет 5 детей. Образование среднее.Клиентка занимается выращиванием пшеницы,помогает ей ее большая и дружная семья.В данный момент они готовятся к очередному посеву пшеницы.Для чего ей нужны деньги ,что бы купить качественные семена пшеницы.Планирует погасить кредит в течении 10 месяцев.
texts.en:
Nigina M. lives in the Vakhsh region. She is 38 years old, is married and has 5 children. Nigina has a high school education. She grows wheat and her large and united family helps her. At the moment, Nigina is getting ready for the next wheat planting. She needs to borrow money to purchase quality seeds. Nigina plans to pay back the loan over 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase wheat seeds

loans.name: Bobomurod

texts.ru: Худжамуродов  Бобомурод житель района Вахш. Возраст 51 год, женат , имеет 5 детей.Клиент  занимается сельским хозяйством. При своем доме он имеет  участок земли ,где сеет  овощи и зелень. На доход от сельского хозяйства от содержит свою большую семью. В данный момент хочет купить минеральные удобрения ,что бы получить качественный урожай. Для чего ему нужны деньги.Планирует погасить кредит в течении  10 месяцев.
texts.en:
Bobomurod H. lives in Vakhsh. He is 51 years old, married, and has five children. The client is engaged in agriculture. He has a field near his home where he grows vegetables and herbs. The income he receives from this supports his large family. Currently, he wants to buy mineral fertilizers in order to harvest a high-quality crop. He needs money for this. He plans to pay off the loan in ten months.

Translated from Russian by Melissa Kniazeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: buying fertilizer

loans.name: Laxmi

texts.en: Laxmi Chitrakar, 40 years old, lives in Kritipur, Kathmandu. She lives in a joint family with 7 members and her husband, Dhumi Chitrakar, their mother, two daughters, and two sons. She opened a small tea and snack shop. She and her husband work together in her shop. Her family's income is not enough to fulfill their needs. She needs a loan to expand her business to earn more and supply her family's basic needs. She seeks Rs. 20000/- to purchase more chairs, tables and utensils for her shop. She wants to to earn more to provide a quality education to her children.

loans.use: To purchase more chairs, tables and others

loans.name: Mastura

texts.ru: Тагоева Мастура жительница района Вахш. Возраст 35 лет, замужем , имеет 5 детей. Образование среднее. Мастура   болле 2 лет занимается сельским хозяйством. Она и ее семья сеют пшеницу на своем участке земли. Готовый урожай они  запасают на целый год, а лишнее обменивают на другие продукты питания,такие как масло и крупы. Сейчас Мастура хочет  купить семеня пшеницы для очередного посева.Планирует погасить кредит в течении 10 месяцев
texts.en:
Mastura T. lives in the Vakhsh district. She is 35 years old, married and has 5 children. She has a secondary education. Mastura has been practicing agriculture for more than 2 years. Her family has a plot of land where they grow wheat. They store the harvest to last through the year and barter any excess for food products, such as butter and grains. Currently, Mastura wants to buy wheat seeds for the upcoming sowing season. She plans to repay the loan within 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase wheat seeds

loans.name: Kamala

texts.en: Kamala T. M., 40 years old, lives in Kritipur, Kathmandu. She lives in a single family with her husband, Khim Bhadur M., and two daughters who are studying in grade 10 and 2. Her husband went abroad for work last year. Her family condition is very weak, so she opened a tea and snacks shop a year ago. She plans to buy a refrigerator for cold drinks like Coke and juic , as well as snacks. She seeks loan of Rs 30000/- for her shop.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator

loans.name: Adolat

texts.ru: Ходжаева Адолат жительница района Вахш. Возраст 38 лет, замужем , имеет 5 детей. Образование среднее. Адолат ,как и многие жители Вахша занимается выращиванием очень ценного для ее народа  продукта. Она выращивает пшеницу. Каждый год она сеет пшеницу на своем небольшом участке. Собрав урожай,клиентка перемалывает  пшеницу в муку.В течении года она печет лепешки и содержит своих детей. Сейчас она хочет закупить семена пшеницы.Для чего она берет кредит.Планирует погасить кредит в течении 10 месяцев.
texts.en:
Adolat H. lives in the Vakhsh district. She is 38 years old, married and has 5 children. She has a secondary education. Adolat, like many Vakhsh citizens, practices agriculture and grows wheat, which is a very valuable product to her people. Every year she sows wheat on her small plot of land. Once she gathers the harvest, Adolat grinds wheat into flour. Throughout the year, she bakes flatbread and feeds her children. Currently, Adolat wants to obtain a loan in order to purchase wheat seeds. She plans to repay the loan within 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase wheat seeds

loans.name: Sobirjon

texts.ru: Аллаяров Собирджон житель района Вахш. Возраст 40 лет, женат , имеет 5 детей. Образование среднее. Клиент более 5 лет занимается выращиванием пшеницы. Так как готовая мука на рынке стоит дорого,а основным  продуктом питания в е го семье является хлеб,Собирджон сам  занимается посевом пшеницы.Если урожай хороший ,то лишнее он реализует своим соседям. В данный момент клиент хочет закупить качественные семена. Планирует погасить кредит в течении 10 месяцев.
texts.en:
Sobirjon A. is a resident of the Vakh region. He is 40 years old, married and has 5 children. Sobirjon has a high school degree and has been growing wheat for more then 5 years for a living. As the market price for flour is very high and bread is the main food staple in Sobirjon's household, he has been growing his own wheat. In years when he has a good harvest Sobirjon is also able to sell some of the grain to his neighbors, which supplements the family's income. Sobirjon wants to ensure a good harvest and would like to purchase good quality seeds for the next year. He is planning to pay back the loan in the next 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchase of wheat seeds

loans.name: Mahmadali

texts.ru: Холматов Махмадали житель района Вахш.Возраст 25 лет, холосост.Образование средние.Махмадали живет с родителями –пенсионерами. Клиент  имеет небольшой участок земли ,на котором каждый год выращивает пшеницу. Готовый урожай  реализует на рынке.Этот вид деятельности помогает ему  не покупать муку на рынке.В данный момент клиент хочет купить качественные семена пшеницы для получения хорошего урожая. Поэтому он решил взять кредит сроком на 12 месяцев.
texts.en:
Mahmadali H. is a resident of the Vakh region. He is 25 years old, single and has a high school degree. Mahmadali lives with his retired parents. He owns a small plot of land where he grows wheat every year and then sells the grain at the local market. By growing his own wheat he can also avoid buying flour at the market. Currently Mahmadali wants to take out a loan to finance the purchase of quality wheat seeds and fertilizer to assure a good harvest next year. He is planning to pay back this loan in the next 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of wheat seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Senada

texts.en:
Senada Salkić was born in 1983 and she is from Lukavac. She produces vegetables in a greenhouse, together with her mother. Now is the season of tomatoes and they are expecting good income from selling this produce.

Also, Senada sells cosmetics and she earns about 100 KM monthly. This is her first loan through WWI in the amount of 600 KM and she will buy a new nylon for the greenhouse. In this way, her greenhouse will be ready for the new season. Her wish is to create conditions for producing vegetables the whole year round and not just in season.

loans.use: To buy nylon for her greenhouse

loans.name: Ibrohim

texts.ru: Сафаров Иброхим житель района Вахш. Возраст 37 лет, женат,имеет 5 детей. Образование средние. Клиент занимается ремонтом грузовых машин. Этим видом деятельности занимается более 3 лет. Предоставляя свои услуги клиент содержит свою семью.Его оборудование устарело ,поэтому он хочет купить новое,более современное.На что ему нужны деньги. Иброхим решил взять кредит сроком на 12 месяцев.
texts.en:
Ibrohim S. is a resident of the Vakh region. He is 37 years old, married and has 5 children. Ibrohim has a high school degree and for the last 3 years has been making a living repairing trucks. This business is the main source of income for his large family. Ibrohim's repair equipment has become old and he would like to purchase new, more modern tools. To finance this purchase Ibrohim wants to take out this loan which he plans to pay back in the next 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of equipment

loans.name: Hosiyat

texts.ru: Кенжаева Хосият жительница района Вахш. Возраст 51 год,замужем, имеет 4 детей. Образование средние. Клиентка на протяжении 15 лет занимается выращиванием  пшеницы. Собрав урожай  она делает запас на год,а остатки реализует на местном рынке. Сельское хозяйство является  основным источником дохода ее большой семьи.Так как готовый хлеб на рынке стоит очень дорого. В данный момент Хосият хочет закупить качественные семеня пшеницы и ГСМ.Планирует погасить кредит в течении 12 месяцев
texts.en:
Hosiyat K. lives in Vakhsh. She is 51, married, and has four children. She has a high school education. The client has, for the past fifteen years, cultivated wheat. After harvest, she stores a year’s worth and takes the rest to market. Agriculture is the fundamental source of income for this big family since baked bread is very expensive at the market. Currently, Hosiyat wants to buy high-quality wheat seed and petroleum products (gasoline and motor oil). She plans to pay off the loan in twelve 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Melissa Kniazeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: buying high-quality wheat seed and petroleum products

loans.name: Aïchetou

texts.fr: Aïchetou A. est âgée de 41 ans, mariée et mère de 4 enfants. Revendeuse des légumes et d’épices, elle habite à Kpalimé, une ville située à environ 120 kilomètres de Lomé la capitale togolaise. Aïchetou désire, par ce crédit, s’approvisionner en diverses légumes afin de répondre aux besoins pressants de la clientèle
texts.en:
Aïchetou A., 41, is married and the mother of 4 children. She sells vegetables and spices and lives in Kpalimé, a town situated about 120 km from Lomé, the capital of Togo. Aïchetou wants to use this loan to stock up on various vegetables so as to meet the pressing needs of her clientele.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy vegetables and spices for resale

loans.name: Nassirou

texts.fr: Nassirou O. est âgé de 39 ans, marié et père de 3 enfants tous à l’école. Revendeur d’huile à moteur et de pétrole lampant depuis plus de 3 ans, Nassirou habite à Kpalimé, une ville située à 120 kilomètres de Lomé, la capitale togolaise. Il aimerait par ce troisième crédit de FECECAV, augmenter la capacité de son commerce en achetant des bidons de carburant afin de pouvoir satisfaire la demande de la clientèle. Il compte sur cette opportunité pour améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille
texts.en:
At 39 years old, Nassirou O. is married and the father of three (3) children who all attend school. He has been a retailer of motor oil and kerosene for the last three (3) years. Nassirou lives in Kpalime, a town located approximately 120 Kilometers from Lome, the Togolese capital. This is his third loan from FECECAV and with it he would like to increase the size of his business, buying drums of fuel to meet his customer demands. He is expecting with this opportunity to improve his family's living conditions.

Translated from French by David Gibbons, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of motor oil and kerosene for resale

loans.name: Claire

texts.fr: Claire B. est âgée de 38 ans, mariée et mère de 2 enfants. Elle est revendeuse ambulante de pagnes à Kpalimé, une ville située à environ 120 kilomètres de Lomé, la capitale togolaise.  Il souhaite par ce crédit s’approvisionner en pagnes afin de répondre aux besoins de la clientèle et aussi louer une pièce afin de pouvoir exposer ses marchandises. Cette opportunité lui permettra de mieux gagner sa vie
texts.en:
Claire B. is 38 years old, married and the mother of two (2) children. She sells "pagne" (decorative cloth) door-to-door in Kplime, a town located about 120 kilometers from Lome, the Togolese capital. With this loan she plans to purchase sufficient pagne to meet the needs of her customers and to rent a stall to exhibit her merchandise. This opportunity would allow her to improve her income.

Translated from French by David Gibbons, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of "pagne" (decorative cloth) and fabrics for resale

loans.name: Tamir Group

texts.en:
Tamir Group is composed of two dedicated women living in a small village in the area of Hasbaya, located in the South of Lebanon. The women of Tamir make "Saj" (traditionA. Lebanese bread). This delicious bread is very popular with their clients. Typically, it is made fresh on a large dome-shaped grill. It is used by families and businesses alike to make many types of famous Lebanese sandwiches or it is dipped in spreads like hummus or baba ghanoush. The work of these women is therefore vitA. to the day-to-day lives of Hasbaya residents. Each woman of the group has requested a loan of $300 in order to finance the purchase of more raw materials for their bread-making businesses.

Hanyah is 63 years old and is a member of the Tamir group. Hanyah has requested a loan of $300 to finance the purchase of more flour and other ingredients for her bread-making business. This purchase will allow Hanyah to increase the amount of bread she can produce. This is a second time Hanyah has requested a loan from A. Majmoua.

Abir is 31 years old, single, and is also a member of the Tamir group. Abir has similarly requested $300 to improve her business. This is the second time Abir has asked for a loan from A. Majmoua.

loans.use: To purchase new machinery and supplies for making bread

loans.name: Awa

texts.fr: Awa S. est revendeuse de pagnes depuis 3 ans à Kpalimé, une ville située à environ 120 kilomètres de Lomé, la capitale togolaise. Agée de 38 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 3 enfants. Awa espère avec ce deuxième crédit, acheter des pagnes et des tissus pour la revente. Ceci va lui permettre d’augmenter son chiffre d’affaire et par conséquent ses profits, source d’amélioration de conditions de vie.
texts.en:
Awa S. has been selling "pagne" (decorative cloth) for three (3) years in Kpalime, a town located about 120 kilometers from Lome, the Togolese capital. Awa is 38 years old, married and a mother of three (3) children. With this second loan she plans to buy pagne and other fabrics for resale. This will allow her to increase her business volume and therefore her profits and improve her lifestyle.

Translated from French by David Gibbons, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of "pagne" (decorative cloth) and other fabrics for resale

loans.name: Camilia

texts.en: Camilia is 53 years old, single, and lives in a small village near Habaya in Southern Lebanon. Camilia is an active member of the group A. Namla, which means "the ant" in Arabic. Camila's ambitions, however, are certainly not ant-like. She has requested a loan of $200 to open a new business selling clothes. This is the first time Camila has requested a loan from A. Majmoua.

loans.use: Purchase stock of clothes to open retail business

loans.name: Ewoevi

texts.fr: Ewoevi K. est âgée de 45 ans, mariée et mère de 4 enfants tous à l’école. Elle est revendeuse, de puis plus de 7 ans, de céréales à Adeta, un village situé à environ 150 kilomètres de Lomé, la capitale togolaise. Elle désire par ce troisième crédit de FECECAV, augmenter la capacité de son commerce en achetant des sacs de maïs, de mils, d’haricots et darachides pour éviter les ruptures de stocks. Ces tonneaux dans la vue lui permettent de stocker ses marchandises. Elle compte sur cette chance pour mieux subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Ewoevi K. is 45 years old, married, and a mother of 4 children, who all go to school. She has been a reseller for more than 7 years, in Adeta, a village about 150 kilometers from Lomé, the capital of Togo. She would like to use this third loan from FECECAV to increase the capacity of her business by buying bags of corn, millet, beans, and peanuts in order to avoid running out of stock. Having these barrels on hand will allow her to stock her merchandise. She is counting on this chance to better provide for her family.

Translated from French by Sherry W., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy bags of corn, millet, beans, and peanuts

loans.name: Modesta

texts.es:
Modesta tiene 5 hijos de 16, 13, 7, 5 y 3 años de edad, su esposo trabaja en el área rural como agricultor. Ella y los niños viven en la calle Sgto de Munaypata  de la zona villa Cooperativa en la ciudad de El Alto.
 
Su oficio es la compra de ovejas en el área rural, animales que luego vende en la feria semanal de la zona, igualmente, realiza tejidos a mano para obtener mayores ingresos.

El crédito lo destinará en la compra de ganado. 
 
Es su segundo  crédito con Impro, la evaluación realizada la califica favorablemente.
texts.en:
Modesta has five children of 16, 13, 7, 5, and 3 years of age. Her husband works in a rural area as a farmer. She and the children live on Sgto de Munaypata street in the "villa Cooperativa" zone in the city of El Alto.

Her craft is the purchase of sheep in rural area, animals that she later sells in the weekly market in the area, also, she makes textiles by hand to make more income.

The loan will be allocated to the purchase of livestock.

This is her second loan with Impro. The completed evaluation qualifies her for the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Joanna Silverman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Business Capital

loans.name: Maritza Maxima

texts.es:
Maritza Q. vive en la zona de villa Cooperativa de la ciudad de El Alto con sus padres e hijos de 18, 12 y 9 respectivamente los cuales estudian en una escuela fiscal de la zona. No tiene casa propia.
 
Tiene un puesto frente a un colegio de la zona donde vende dulces por las mañanas y por las tardes tiene un trabajo en la misma zona donde confecciona chamarras.

El crédito lo destinara  como capital de trabajo. 
 
Es su segundo  crédito con Impro, dado que ambas ocupaciones le reportan beneficios, es una persona apta para recibir un crédito.
texts.en:
Maritza Q. lives in the area of Villa Cooperativa in the city of El Alto with her parents and children of 18, 12, and 9 years of age, respectively. They study in the local school. She does not have her own house.

She has a stand in front of a high school in the area where she sells sweets in the mornings and, in the afternoons, she has a job working in the same area where she makes jackets.

The loan will be allocated as capital for her work.

This is her second loan with Impro, given that both jobs give her profits, she is a person likely to receive a loan.

Translated from Spanish by Joanna Silverman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Business Capital

loans.name: Maria Claudia

texts.es:
Maria B. tiene dos hijos de 14 y 12 años de edad respectivamente. Vive en la calle 24 de junio  de la zona villa Esperanza, ciudad de El Alto. La familia paga el alquiler de una habitación, por lo que no tienen suficiente comodidad, no obstante, su negocio de compra-venta de ropa usada y comercialización de animales le permiten subsistir. Por lo que solicita capital de trabajo. 
Es su primer crédito con Impro y es apta para recibir su ayuda.
texts.en:
Maria B. has two children of 14 and 12 years of age, respectively. She lives on "24 de junio" street in the villa Esperanza zone, city of El Alto. The family pays rent for a room and because of this they don't have sufficient comfort. Nevertheless, her business of buying-selling used clothing and the sale of animals allows her to survive. It is for this that she requests capital for her work.

This is her first loan with Impro and she is likely to receive her help.

Translated from Spanish by Joanna Silverman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Business Capital

loans.name: Rene

texts.es: Rene G. es casado, tiene dos hijos de 4 y 2 años respectivamente. La familia  vive en la calle Sucre de la zona Rio seco en la ciudad de El Alto. Rene es conductor de minibús y también se dedica a la carpintería. Solicita crédito para comprar repuestos para su vehículo. Es su primer crédito en Impro y nuestras evaluaciones indican que puede recibir su ayuda.
texts.en:
Rene G. is married and has two sons, who are 4 and 2 years of age respectively. The family lives on Sucre Street in the Rio Seco neighborhood in the city of El Alto. Rene is a mini-bus driver and also works in carpentry. He is applying for a loan to purchase parts for his vehicle. It is his first credit in Impro and our evaluations indicate that he can receive your help.

Translated from Spanish by Aimee Sostowski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Mini-Bus Maintenance

loans.name: Rosario Alejandra

texts.es: Rosario M. es soltera y  vive en la avenida Santísima Trinidad de la zona villa Cooperativa  en la ciudad de El Alto, junto a sus padres. Es enfermera en un hospital de la ciudad. Solicita crédito para pagar sus estudios de post grado. Es su primer crédito en Impro, pero a diferencia de otros clientes, su ocupación laboral es más estable por lo que aseguramos todo tipo de garantía.
texts.en:
Rosario M. is single and lives with her parents on Santísima Trinidad Avenue in the Cooperativa neighborhood of the city of El Alto. She is a nurse in a city hospital. She is applying for a loan to pay for her post-graduate studies. It is her first credit with Impro, but her occupation is more stable than other clients, which is why we are sure of her collateral.

Translated from Spanish by Aimee Sostowski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Payment of Post-Graduate Studies

loans.name: Leila

texts.en: Leila is 45 years old, married, and has 2 children. She is part of the "Yamen" solidarity group, a lending group of women living in Hasbaya, which is situated in the South of Lebanon.  Leila sells Tupperware items to the families and businesses of the surrounding region. The larger the stock purchase that she makes, the bigger the discount she will receive, and thus Leila has requested a loan of $500 to finance this investment in her business. Her children describe her as a courageous mother and her entire family has confidence in her ability to successfully expand her operations. This is the third time Leila has requested a loan from Al Majmoua.

loans.use: Purchase new supply of Tupperware for retail

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es: Verónica B. vive en la calle Sgto de Munaypata  de la zona villa Cooperativa en la ciudad de El Alto, junto a sus padres y su marido quien actualmente esta prestando el servicio militar. Verónica se dedica a la compra de ovejas en el área rural, las cuales ella vende en las ferias semanales. Por lo que requiere crédito para comprar más ganado. Es su segundo crédito en Impro, pueden confiar plenamente en ella.
texts.en:
Verónica B. lives on the Sgto de Munaypata Street in the Cooperativa neighborhood of the city of El Alto together with her parents and her husband who is currently serving in the military. Verónica works purchasing sheep in the rural area, which she sells at the weekly markets. She requires a loan to purchase more livestock. This is her second loan with Impro and you can trust fully in her.

Translated from Spanish by Aimee Sostowski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working Capital

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
Jose A. vive en la zona de villa Cooperativa de la ciudad de El Alto con sus abuelos, su madre y sus hermanas de 12 y 9 años respectivamente.
 
Trabaja en un taller de tallado de muebles de lunes a sábado desde las 8:30 hasta las 17:00.

El crédito lo destinara para compra de maquinaria de carpintería, lo cual le permitirá tener su propio taller en su domicilio. 
 
Es su primer crédito con Impro, el emprendimiento de José no tiene riesgo, al contrario, le presenta la oportunidad de completa independencia, por lo que esta calificado para recibir el dinero.
texts.en:
Jose A. lives in the Cooperativa neighborhood of the city of El Alto with his grandparents, his mother and his sisters, who are 12 and 9 years old respectively. He works in a furniture carving workshops Monday to Saturday from 8:30 - 17:00. The loan will go towards the purchase of carpentry machinery, which will allow him to have his own workshop in his home. It is his first loan with Impro. Jose’s enterprise does not have risk, but instead presents the opportunity of complete independence, which is why he is qualified to receive the money.

Translated from Spanish by Aimee Sostowski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working Capital

loans.name: Samar

texts.en: Samar is 42 years old, married, and has 3 children. As part of the Yamen solidarity group, Samar sells lingerie to the women of her region. Samar has requested a loan of $600 to purchase more merchandise and to diversify her inventory of goods. Samar has been a micro-credit client of A. Majmoua for the past 3 years and has always repaid her debts on time.

loans.use: Help to diversify her stock of clothing

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es:
Luisa M.  vive en la zona de villa cooperativa  de la ciudad de El Alto con su hijo de 12 años, el cual estudia en una escuela fiscal de la zona. Tiene su casa propia hecha de adobe.
 
La Sra. Comercializa chuño y tunta en la población de Senkata los fines de semana en la feria, además vende queso el cual elabora todos los días de la leche de sus ganados.

El crédito lo destinara para capital de trabajo. 
 
Es su segundo  crédito con Impro, los exhortamos a confiar en ella
texts.en:
Luisa M. lives in the Cooperativa neighborhood in the city of El Alto with her 12 year old son who studies in a local school. She has her own house which is made of adobe. She sells products derived from potatoes, “chuño” and “tunta”, in the Senkata weekend market in addition to cheese that she makes everyday with the milk from her cows. This loan will goes towards working capital. It is her second loan with Impro and we urge you to trust her.

Translated from Spanish by Aimee Sostowski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working Capital

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto I. es divorciado, vive solo y paga el alquiler de una habitación ubicada en la avenida Unión  Fátima  de la zona villa Cooperativa, ciudad de El Alto.
 
Se dedica a la compra-venta de moneda extranjera en el centro de la ciudad de La Paz.

El crédito lo destinara  para incrementar su capital de trabajo. 
 
Es su primer  crédito con Impro, la evaluación realizada lo califica para otorgarle el crédito.
texts.en:
Alberto I. is divorced. He lives alone and pages to rent a home located in Unión Fátima Avenue in the zone Villa Cooperativa, in the city of El Alto. He works buying and selling foreign money in the center of the city La Paz. This loan would be used to increase his working capitol. This is his first loan with Impro, the test evaluated him as qualified to receive a loan.

Translated from Spanish by Jessica Kaminsky, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working Capitol

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana Q. C. es casada y tiene dos hijos (3 y 6 años de edad). Vive en un pequeño departamento  en la C. 3  de la zona 23 de Marzo  en la ciudad de El Alto. 

Trabaja como ayudante en el minibús, el cual conduce su esposo.

El crédito será destinado para adquirir  llantas para el vehiculo. 
 
Es su primer  crédito con Impro, los resultados de nuestra evaluación indican que puede acceder al préstamo.
texts.en:
Juana Q. C. is married and has two children (3 and 6 years of age). She lives in a small district on street "3" in the "23 de Marzo" zone in the city of El Alto.

She works as an assistant in the minibus that her husband drives.

Her loan will be allocated to acquire tires for the vehicle.

This is her first loan with Impro. The results of our evaluation indicate that she is qualified for the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Joanna Silverman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Vehicle Maintenance

loans.name: Valentin

texts.es:
Valentín M.  tiene casa propia en la zona de Munaipata, ladera norte de esta ciudad. Valentin es casado y tiene 3 hijas.

Su ocupación laboral es la de albañil en obras particulares de la ciudad de La Paz, trabaja junto a su esposa que también es ayudante.
Con anteriores préstamos realizaron la construcción de una loza de hormigón armado y la estructura para una habitación nueva en planta alta. Ahora solicita crédito  para la construcción de una habitación de ladrillo sobre la loza ya construida.
Esta es la séptima vez que solicita préstamo y el análisis socioeconómico realizado lo califica favorablemente.
texts.en:
Valentín M. has his own house in the Munaipata zone on the north side of the city. Valentín is married and has three daughters. His job is as a bricklayer in certain jobs in the city of La Paz. He works with his wife who is also a helper.

With previous loans, they completed the construction of a reinforced concrete floor and the structure for a new room on the second floor. Now he requests a loan for the construction of a room made of brick on the already constructed floor.

This is the seventh time that he has asked for loan and the completed socio-economic analysis qualifies him for the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Joanna Silverman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Construction

loans.name: Wared

texts.en: "Al Amal," which means "hope," is the name of a solidarity group of several women living in Hasbaya in the South of Lebanon. Wared is a 36-year-old single woman who is part of this lending group. Wared sells beautiful handbags and shoes. Wared has requested $US500 to improve her business by adding to the diversity of her offerings. This will be the third time Wared has borrowed from Al Majmoua.

loans.use: Diversify shop inventory

loans.name: Dania

texts.en:
Dania is a 28-year-old woman who lives in Hasbaya, Southern Lebanon.
Dania sells cosmetic creams and makeup to local women. Dania is part of a solidarity group called "Gardenia," and has asked for a loan of $300 to purchase new cosmetics for her burgeoning retail business.

loans.use: To help expand her makeup stock

loans.name: Victor Eduardo

texts.es:
Victor se dedica a la cría de ganado vacuno, cuya producción de leche Comercializa a PIL Andina (Planta Industrializadota de Leche).
 
Vive. en la comunidad de Vilaque de la Provincia Los Andes del departamento de La Paz, ubicada a dos horas de la ciudad de La Paz.. Es casado y tiene tres hijos de 8, 4 y 2 años respectivamente.
 
El crédito lo destinara en la compra de  ganado de raza mejorada para incrementar su  producción y por lo tanto sus ingresos..
 
Es su segundo crédito con Impro, la evaluación realizada le califica para otorgarle el préstamo
texts.en:
Victor raises cattle whose milk he sells to the PIL Andina milk plant.

He lives in the Vilaque de la Provincia Los Andes community in the state of La Paz, located two hours from the city of La Paz. He is married and has three children, 8, 4, and 2 years-old, respectively.

The loan will be allocated to the purchase of a better breed of cattle to increase his production and therefore his income.

This is his second loan with Impro, his completed evaluation qualifies him to be granted this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Joanna Silverman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of Livestock

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
Virginia  vive en la calle San Bartolomé de la zona Villa Cooperativa  en la ciudad de El Alto. Es casada y tiene un hijo de 12 años.

Se dedica a la confección de polleras y venta de golosinas en la puerta de una escuela de la zona.

El crédito lo destinara en la compra de lmercaderias. 
 
Es su  segundo crédito con Impro, la evaluación realizada la califica para otorgarle el crédito.
texts.en:
Virginia lives on San Bartolomé Street in the Villa Cooperativa zone in the city of El Alto. She is married and has a twelve-year-old son. She prepares poultry and sells sweets at the entrance of a school in the area. This loan will be used to buy merchandise. This is Virginia’s second loan with Impro. The assessment carried out qualifies her to be awarded the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Garden Of Hope Group

texts.en: Garden of Hope is a support group for people living with HIV/Aids with its main offices at Coast Provincial General Hospital. The group has a membership of 25 active members. Its activities include nutrition support, psycho-social support, home-based care and income generating activities. Fifteen  members have applied for US $3000 to support their income generating activities.

loans.use: Improve their income generating activities.

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es:
Emilio vive en la calle Portocarrero  de la zona Franz Tamayo en la ciudad de El Alto. Tiene esposa y dos hijos. 
Se dedica al transporte publico en su minibús durante toda la semana.

El crédito lo destinara en la compra de repuestos para su vehiculo.  
 
Es su primer  crédito con Impro, la evaluación realizada lo califica óptimamente.
texts.en:
Emilio lives on Portocarrero Street, in the Franz Tamayo zone, in the city of El Alto. He has a wife and two children. He uses his minibus for public transportation during the whole week. This loan will be used to buy spare parts for his vehicle. This is his first loan with Impro. The assessment carried out rated him optimally.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Maintenance of his vehicle

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.en:
Miguel Angel is a 28-year-old man who lives in the tropical Santa Cruz region of eastern Bolivia. Miguel Angel's wife is currently in Spain. Miguel rents out several rooms and four motorcycles. Motorcycle rentals are very lucrative, since this is the most common form of transportation in Santa Cruz, and Miguel's prices are very reasonable. He charges 2 bolivianos (about 28 cents) per leg of each trip by motorcycle, and US $120 per month for the rooms he rents.

Miguel has years of experience renting motorcycles, and though there is a lot of competition, his business is doing well. He will use this loan to buy another motorcycle. Miguel currently has another loan out with Fades, another Bolivian microcredit institution, but his loan officer has determined that he has the capacity to repay both loans simultaneously.

loans.use: Buy a motorcycle to rent out

loans.name: Estefania Lesly

texts.es:
Estefanía vive en la avenida Unión  Fátima  de la zona villa Cooperativa  en la ciudad de El Alto. Junto a su madre y sus hermanos, ella es soltera.
Actualmente continua sus estudios,  también se dedica a la venta de artículos de belleza por lo cual recibe un porcentaje sobre ventas.  Las ganancias son invertidas en la compra de material de estudio  

El crédito lo destinara en la compra de mercadería con el fin de aumentar  sus ganancias
 
Es su primer  crédito en Impro, es una colegiala pero a su edad ya es bastante emprendedora y por lo tanto se debe fomentar a esta persona
texts.en:
Estefanía lives on Unión Fátima Avenue in the Villa Cooperativa zone in the city of El Alto with her mother and siblings. She is single. At present, she is continuing with her studies. She also sells beauty products, for which she receive a percentage of the sales. The earnings are invested into the purchase of materials for school. Estafanía will use this loan to buy merchandise with the goal of increasing her earnings. This is her first loan with Impro. She is a schoolgirl, but at her age, she is already quite enterprising and, as a result, you should support her.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Celestina

texts.es:
Celestina  vive en la calle Antonio Arze  de la zona villa Ingenio en la ciudad de El Alto. Ella es casada (su marido es transportista) y tiene 3 hijos. 
Se dedica al la venta ambulante de golosinas en las diferentes ferias de la cuidad de El Alto.

El crédito lo destinara en la compra de mercaderia en mayor cantidad. 
 
Es su segundo  crédito con Impro, la evaluación realizada la califica para otorgarle el crédito
texts.en:
Celestina lives on Antonio Arze street in the Villa Ingenio zone of the city of El Alto, Bolivia. She is married (her husband works in transportation) and has three children. She is a street vendor and sells sweets at different markets in El Alto.

She will use the loan to buy bulk merchandise. This is her second loan from Impro, and according to a review of her credit history she is qualified to receive the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia McMurry, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy sweets in bulk to resell

loans.name: Angel

texts.en:
Angel is a 46 year old man who lives in the tropical Santa Cruz region of eastern Bolivia. He lives with his wife and their son, who helps him with his work as a contractor. Angel also builds cabins and stables. Angel has many years of experience and is very well known in the area. He has very little competition, since most of the contractors in his area moved to Spain to look for better paying jobs. Contractors are in high demand where he lives, so Angel has lots of work, and the prices he can charge have risen substantially due to the lack of contractors in the area.

Angel will use this loan to buy a motorcycle for personal use. He has no negative credit history, according to his credit report.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Khodr

texts.en: Khodr, 53 years old, is married and has eight children. He lives in the region of Nabatiyeh in the South of Lebanon. Khodr is a taxi driver. Income from the business helps him and his wife provide for the needs of their family. Khodr needs a loan of $US1,000 for the maintenance of his taxi, which will allow him to keep on being a taxi driver. This is Khodr's second time requesting a loan from Al Majmoua.

loans.use: To assist with taxi repairs

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah M. sells groceries like milk, Milo, and different kinds of canned products at Elmina. Sarah has received no education. She is a widow and has 5 children. She is responsible for paying the utility bills and her children's school fees. She plans to use the loan to buy more product to resell to increase her income. She hopes to use the increased profit from her business to improve her children's education.

loans.use: Buy more products to sell in the grocery store to increase income

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Dona Maria is from the tropical Santa Cruz region of eastern Bolivia. She lives in her own home with her husband and her 17-year-old son. This photo was taken of her husband, Filiberto C., because Dona Maria was out running errands when her loan officer went to visit her.

The couple has two sources of income: 1) an automotive workshop in their home and 2) food and drink sales from a lunch counter they run on the weekend. There is little competition in car repairs, since they have regular customers who drive big rigs and other large automobiles. There is a lot of competition with other lunch counters, but there is also high demand, and Dona Maria and Don Filiberto have many regular customers.

The couple would like to use this loan to buy more drinks for their lunch counter as well as some additional tools for their repair shop. This is Dona Maria's third loan, and she is considered an excellent client since she has always been very punctual with her repayments.

loans.use: Buy drinks for re-sale and car repair tools

loans.name: Kokouvi

texts.fr: Kokouvi A. est âgé de 28 ans, célibataire sans enfants. Il tient une cabine de traitement de texte depuis 2 ans à Adeta, un village situé à environ 150 kilomètres de Lomé, la capitale togolaise. Il désire par ce crédit acheter un nouveau copieur , puisque le premier est usé engendre beaucoup de frais pour les réparations, ainsi que des fournitures de bureau. Cette chance lui permettra de répondre aux services de la clientèle et les fonds lui serviront de rembourser son crédit et aussi de dégager des profits afin de subvenir à ses propres besoins et ceux de ses petits frères.
texts.en:
